#summary TRANSIMS Version 5 Documentation

= TRANSIMS Version 5 =

Version 5 of TRANSIMS is still under development.  It is recommended that you review the training materials and Execution Service first. 

*[V5Training Training Materials]* - Explanatory materials with a hands-on example

*Quick References* - In version 5, quick reference information is generated by running the program in question
with specified keys. For example, options for generating quick reference materials for !TransimsNet include
the following.  In these cases, the use of a control file is optional.

||| *Command*     || *Comment*    	||
|| !TransimsNet -H ||  Shows program syntax and control ||
|| !TransimsNet -C ||  Create/update a self-documenting control file ||
|| !TransimsNet -X ||  Write an XML file with control keys ||
|| !TransimsNet -R ||  Write control keys and report names ||

The *[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/v5/trunk/documentation/usermanuals/ExecutionService_V5.0.pdf Execution Service]*, written by AECOM, describes the syntax for running TRANSIMS programs.  

The *[V5ProgramReferences Program References]* describe each program.  
The *[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/v5/trunk/documentation/usermanuals/FileReference_V5.0_R0.6.pdf file]* and *[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/v5/trunk/documentation/usermanuals/ParameterReference_V5.0_R0.6.pdf parameter]* references describe the files and parameters used by the programs.

This is all a work in progress. The last update occurred on 19 April 2013.
